TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Maifor, title = Maifor, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maifor} }

S.FORM: Maifor Itiniay i Ruisui Cen no Hualien ko Maifor a niyaro', 108 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 245 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 180 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 65 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 39%, Bunun 3%, Tayal 4%, Paiwan 1%, 撒奇拉雅族25%, roma 1%.

Maifor Itiniay i Roisoi Cen no Hoalien ko Maifor a niyaro', 108 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 245 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 180 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 65 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 39%, Bonon 3%, Tayal 4%, Paiwan 1%, 撒奇拉雅族25%, roma 1%.
